        If there is an open hash batch, complete it and sync if there are diffs. Start a new batch, and seek to read the
        Throws:

      • finishBatchAndCompareHashes

        private void finishBatchAndCompareHashes(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context)
                                  throws IOException,
                                         InterruptedException
        Finish the currently open hash batch. Compare the target hash to the given source hash. If they do not match, then sync the covered key range.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • toHex

        private static String toHex(ImmutableBytesWritable bytes)

      • syncRange

        private void syncRange(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context,
                       ImmutableBytesWritable startRow,
                       ImmutableBytesWritable stopRow)
                throws IOException,
                       InterruptedException
        Rescan the given range directly from the source and target tables. Count and log differences, and if this is not a dry run, output Puts and Deletes to make the target table match the source table for this range
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • syncRowCells

        private boolean syncRowCells(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context,
                             byte[] rowKey,
                             SyncTable.SyncMapper.CellScanner sourceCells,
                             SyncTable.SyncMapper.CellScanner targetCells)
                      throws IOException,
                             InterruptedException
        Compare the cells for the given row from the source and target tables. Count and log any differences. If not a dry run, output a Put and/or Delete needed to sync the target table to match the source table.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • compareRowKeys

        private static int compareRowKeys(byte[] r1,
                                  byte[] r2)
        Compare row keys of the given Result objects. Nulls are after non-nulls

      • compareCellKeysWithinRow

        private static int compareCellKeysWithinRow(Cell c1,
                                            Cell c2)
        Compare families, qualifiers, and timestamps of the given Cells. They are assumed to be of the same row. Nulls are after non-nulls.
